name: Pokémon Fool's Gold
overview: In Pokemon Fools Gold, all of the Pokémon have been reworked… think Alolan/Galarian forms, for all the Pokemon. All 251 Pokémon are available in-game without trading. All of the trainers and wild encounters have been reworked to fit as well. In addition, there have been a few visual tweaks, and a few new places to explore, too!
